resources.string:
Hi, Assalamualaikum my name is Alya Imanina. 

I am 23 years old and I am from Kemaman, Terengganu. 

I am now pursuing a bachelors degree in computer science with a concentration in mobile computing at the University of Malaysia Terengganu.


I am presently in my final year of study, and I am hopeful that I will graduate on time and with honours. 
Then, in the future, Ill be able to acquire a good job.
